txt.en:
'What am I missing? Ah, of course -- meat for the spit. I have neglected my duties for the banquet and must quickly rectify the situation.

'There is a herd of boars that can be found along the eastern edge of Gelirdor a fair way north of here, though any boars of Lothlórien will do. Bring me back some nice, large cuts of boar-meat.

'Did I say something amusing? Do they not hunt boars in your lands?'

'Ah, boar! There is nothing like it, is there? I do not think anyone could ever get tired of juicy....\n\n'What is the matter with you, [placeholder]? Why do you roll your eyes every time I speak of boars?'
'I have not enough meat for the feast... hurry along and hunt some boars for me.'

'What is this? You cannot find a boar to skewer?\n\n'It is true that some days it seems one might not find a boar were you to wander the whole length and breadth of Middle-earth, yet I assure you they are out there.'
Maliriel has asked you to help her companions complete the preparations for the upcoming banquet.
Boars can often be found roaming the forest north of the banquet grounds along the eastern border of Gelirdor.\n\nHadhelen has requested that you fetch boar-meat for the main course of the feast.
Talk to Hadhelen at the Vineyards of Lórien
Hadhelen is at the Vineyards of Lórien, far to the south of Gelirdor.\n\nYou should return to Hadhelen with the meat he requested.
